column2: "/ci1 2 Excellent timing, my dear! Please help this poor, fragile maiden, for both her body and her heart are oh so weak!"
"/ci2 2 We did it! My desperate struggle finally reaps its deserved rewards! Now then, as I am such a weak young maiden, I shall just slip away..."

"Oh, oh, how terrible...
That my story should end like this..."

"...Saga, say it isn't so!
There's... There's nowhere to run. We will hold them back for now!"
